verses.verse: ( Clap Your Hands, All You Peoples) לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ׀ <WH5329> lam·naṣ·ṣê·aḥ For the choirmaster. לִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> liḇ·nê- of the sons קֹ֬רַח <WH7141> qō·raḥ of Korah. מִזְמֽוֹר׃ <WH4210> miz·mō·wr A Psalm כָּֽל־ <WH3605> kāl- all you peoples הָ֭עַמִּים <WH5971> hā·‘am·mîm ...; תִּקְעוּ־ <WH8628> tiq·‘ū- Clap כָ֑ף <WH3709> ḵāp̄ your hands, הָרִ֥יעוּ <WH7321> hā·rî·‘ū shout לֵ֝אלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> lê·lō·hîm unto God בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> bə·qō·wl with a voice רִנָּֽה׃ <WH7440> rin·nāh of triumph.

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- How יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD עֶלְי֣וֹן <WH5945> ‘el·yō·wn Most High, נוֹרָ֑א <WH3372> nō·w·rā awesome [is] מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> me·leḵ King גָּ֝דוֹל <WH1419> gā·ḏō·wl the great עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- over כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> hā·’ā·reṣ the earth!

יַדְבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> yaḏ·bêr He subdues עַמִּ֣ים <WH5971> ‘am·mîm nations תַּחְתֵּ֑ינוּ <WH8478> taḥ·tê·nū beneath us, וּ֝לְאֻמִּ֗ים <WH3816> ū·lə·’um·mîm and peoples תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> ta·ḥaṯ under רַגְלֵֽינוּ׃ <WH7272> raḡ·lê·nū our feet.

יִבְחַר־ <WH977> yiḇ·ḥar- He chooses לָ֥נוּ Prep│1cp ( lā·nū) for us, אֶת־ 853 DirObjM ( ’eṯ-) - נַחֲלָתֵ֑נוּ 5159 N-fsc│1cp ( na·ḥă·lā·ṯê·nū) our inheritance אֶ֥ת 853 DirObjM ( ’eṯ) - גְּא֨וֹן 1347 N-msc ( gə·’ō·wn) the pride יַעֲקֹ֖ב 3290 N-proper-ms ( ya·‘ă·qōḇ) of Jacob, אֲשֶׁר־ 834 Pro-r ( ’ă·šer-) whom אָהֵ֣ב 157 V-Qal-Perf-3ms ( ’ā·hêḇ) He loves. סֶֽלָה׃ 5542 Interjection ( se·lāh) Selah

עָלָ֣ה <WH5927> ‘ā·lāh has ascended אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm God בִּתְרוּעָ֑ה <WH8643> biṯ·rū·‘āh amid shouts of joy, יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> bə·qō·wl with the sound שׁוֹפָֽר׃ <WH7782> šō·w·p̄ār of the horn.

זַמְּר֣וּ <WH2167> zam·mə·rū Sing praises אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm to God, זַמֵּ֑רוּ <WH2167> zam·mê·rū sing praises; זַמְּר֖וּ <WH2167> zam·mə·rū sing praises לְמַלְכֵּ֣נוּ <WH4428> lə·mal·kê·nū to our King, זַמֵּֽרוּ׃ <WH2167> zam·mê·rū sing praises!

כִּ֤י <WH3588> kî For מֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> me·leḵ is King כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- of all הָאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> hā·’ā·reṣ the earth; אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm God זַמְּר֥וּ <WH2167> zam·mə·rū sing profound praises to Him מַשְׂכִּֽיל׃ <WH4905> maś·kîl .... ( Or sing a Maskil of praise or sing praises with understanding)

מָלַ֣ךְ <WH4427> mā·laḵ reigns אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm God עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- over גּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> gō·w·yim the nations; אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm God יָשַׁ֤ב׀ <WH3427> yā·šaḇ is seated עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- on כִּסֵּ֬א <WH3678> kis·sê throne. קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH6944> qā·ḏə·šōw His holy

נְדִ֘יבֵ֤י <WH5081> nə·ḏî·ḇê The nobles עַמִּ֨ים׀ <WH5971> ‘am·mîm of the nations נֶאֱסָ֗פוּ <WH622> ne·’ĕ·sā·p̄ū have assembled עַם֮ <WH5971> ‘am as the people אֱלֹהֵ֪י <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hê of the God אַבְרָ֫הָ֥ם <WH85> ’aḇ·rā·hām of Abraham; כִּ֣י <WH3588> kî for לֵֽ֭אלֹהִים <WH430> lê·lō·hîm belong to God; מָֽגִנֵּי־ <WH4043> mā·ḡin·nê- the shields אֶ֗רֶץ <WH776> ’e·reṣ of the earth מְאֹ֣ד <WH3966> mə·’ōḏ He is highly נַעֲלָֽה׃ <WH5927> na·‘ă·lāh exalted.
